comment: "The limo company owner, Shahed Hussain, has been located but is currently out of the country, state police said in a news conference Monday afternoon. Three vehicles have been seized in the investigation, and authorities are examining the airbag control module in the crashed limo -- essentially the black box. . " ? "Hussain once worked as an FBI informant after he pleaded guilty to driver license fraud in ," the I-Team reported Monday."
